worker.description: Worker for the action execution, values = default, lsom, triggers

input.description: Inputs required by the action execution

output.description: Set the action execution output value if required

params.description: Optional System parameters for the action execution

description.description: Action execution description, should be set exclusively and not combined with state or any other parameters

state.description: set action_execution state, should be set exclusively and not combined with description

output.description: set action_execution output, output is the published result to the task

params.description: Optional System parameters for the action execution

worker.description: Worker selection for the action execution, values = default, lsom, triggers

workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow to be scheduled

pattern.description: Set the schedule using Cron pattern e.g. <0 12 * * ?> runs at 12pm everyday

first_execution_time.description: First Occurrence, format <YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM> Must be 1 minute in the future. Time expected to be in UTC

workflow_params.description: Optional System parameters for the workflow execution

notifyKafka.description: Subscribe workflow execution and task execution status to kafka topic 'wfm.nbi_webhook_subscription'

input.description: Input required by the workflow execution

params.description: Optional System parameters for the workflow execution

worker.description: Worker, selects the engine & executor pair to run executions. Supported Values: default, lsom

input.description: Input required by the workflow execution

params.description: Optional System parameters for the workflow execution

notifyKafka.description: Subscribe workflow execution and action execution status to kafka topic 'nsp.wfm_webhook'

worker.description: Worker, selects the engine & executor pair to run executions. Supported Values: default, lsom

filter_expression.description: Filter expression in json-path or regex format

payload_type.description: Type of payload to test filter against (JSON/TEXT)

payload.description: Payload to test against. If filter type is TEXT, then json should only have one key named 'text'

kafka_event.description: Kafka event type (CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE for NSP model object topics or JSON for plain json)

trigger_rule.description: JSONPath expression to match kafka message payload e.g. $[?(@.neId == '11.11.11.11')]

workflow_id.description: UUID of workflow to execute if trigger_rule matches Kafka message payload

workflow_name.description: Name of workflow to execute if trigger_rule matches Kafka message payload

enabled.description: Flag indicating whether or not this kafka-trigger is enabled

rate_limit_per_minute.description: Limit to how many times this kafka-trigger will be executed per minute

match_count.description: Count of how many times this kafka-trigger was matched to a kafka message

execution_count.description: Count of how many times a match caused this kafka-trigger to execute workflow (within rate limit)

subscription_status.description: Status of the subscription to the Kafka topic of this kafka-trigger

topic.description: The topic to listen to (default nsp-db-fm)

kafka_event.description: Kafka event type (CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE for NSP model objects or JSON for plain json)

trigger_rule.description: JSONPath expression to match kafka message payload e.g. $[?(@.neId == '11.11.11.11')]

workflow_id.description: UUID of workflow to execute if trigger_rule matches Kafka message payload

enabled.description: Flag indicating whether or not this kafka-trigger is enabled

rate_limit_per_minute.description: Limit to how many times this kafka-trigger will be executed per minute

nextPage.description: (Optional) A paged URL request pointing to the next page of data, or "null" if there is no next page.

previousPage.description: (Optional) A paged URL request pointing to the previous page of data, or "null" if there is no previous page.

worker.description: Worker the task execution, values = default, lsom, triggers

reset.description: Restart the task. Default is true, false is only applicable to tasks using with-items

env.description: Update environment variables in the task if needed

userGroups.description: User Groups to associate with Workflow ids

workflowIds.description: Workflow ids to update user groups

gitUpdate.description: Update available for GitHub imported workflow

provided_by.description: Workflow author/provider, workflow definition author takes precedence
